archimate:Requirement.name: SA-17(2): Developer Security and Privacy Architecture and Design | Security-relevant Components
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Require the developer of the system, system component, or system service to: (a) Define security-relevant hardware, software, and firmware; and (b) Provide a rationale that the definition for security-relevant hardware, software, and firmware is complete.

properties.value: The security-relevant hardware, software, and firmware represent the portion of the system, component, or service that is trusted to perform correctly to maintain required security properties.
